name: Swarm (itch) (horsimann)
description:
Swarm by Horsimann for

GMTK Game Jam 2021

Manage a fish swarm and control an individual fish by tipping on it.

Let the swarm grow by adding new fishs.

Move the swarm to let them eat feed and get a new high score.

Behold the sharks!

Runs also nice on Android Smartphones with touch control

Second web version via my github page:

https://github.com/renehorstmann/GMTKgamejam21

This game is written in C and compiled via emscripten, using my some framework
